message: Let's be fair and split the money, Bob. This offer is a good deal for both of us.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, still a good deal for you!
Bob, my offer is still the best option. This money will be worth a lot less soon.
Come on, Alice, I'm starting to lose value here! Meet me in the middle... or close to it.
Bob, we're running out of time, and the money is losing value fast. This is my final offer.
